name: Vrijraj Singh
bio: Vrijraj is a front-end developer by profession and a community champion by passion. He is an organizer for GDG Jalandhar and a Google Developers Expert for Firebase and Web Technologies. He has given 100+ talks and workshops for communities over the past 5 years. His areas of expertise are around Web, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, and UI/UX Design. He is always eager to learn new technologies and develop solutions based on them. He enjoys mentoring people and nurturing communities. Outside work, he is a foodie and enjoys watching YouTube videos.

name: Ashwani Kumar
bio: I am a cybersecurity enthusiast having a great interest in web application development and security.

name: Siv Ram Shastri
bio: I am a frontend Web Developer interested in creating beautiful Web pages. Also, I deliver sessions at GDG Jalandhar and I love contributing to the opensource.

name: Batchu Thrishna
bio:
Thrishna is a talented individual who seeks to explore new opportunities and accept challenges to enhance personal development. She is a UI/UX Designer mainly focusing on mobile interface designing with the help of the tools like Figma, Adobe XD & Photoshop.

She is a 2021 graduate in Computer Science from Lovely Professional University, Punjab. She has been a part of many developer communities out there & has served as a volunteer at various Workshops and Hackathons.

Her daily routine revolves around learning and designing beautiful interfaces. Thrishna is also an active contributor at Google Developers Group - GDG Jalandhar Community, where she volunteers the monthly meetups and delivers keynote sessions as well.

name: Varsha Jaiswal
bio: Varsha is a girl with a bag full of hardwork and determination to fulfill her responsibilities. Working as a Software Engineer, she has a keen interest in working on new technologies. Being a facilitator of #IamRemarkable Workshop, she always gives her best to motivate her surrounding. Despite busy schedules, she never misses any chance to travel and eat.
